title: Rachel Reeves – 2022 Comments on Latest GDP Figures
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rachel Reeves, the Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 22 December 2022.
content:
GDP data has been revised down, leaving the UK with the worst growth in the G7 in the last quarter.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

The Tories have lost control of the economy and are leaving millions of working people paying the price.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

Only Labour has a proper plan to get our economy growing.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
